io.name: TCISCTCN0050301_INBOUND

value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="H" /> value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="P" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="10" /> </restriction> </simpleType> /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="P" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1000" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="limit"> <annotation> <documentation>최대조회갯수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </schema>

io.name: TCISCTCN0050301_OUTBOUND

<maxLength value="1000" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="card_cnt"> <annotation> <documentation>보유카드수</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="3" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="card_list" type="tns:card_list_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>보유카드목록</documentation> <appinfo> <p:adjustLength category="variableField" lengthFieldURL="card_cnt" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="card_list_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="card_id"> <annotation> <documentation>카드식별자</documentation> value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="300" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="card_member"> <annotation> <documentation>본인가족구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="card_type"> <annotation> value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> <p:api_data_area_dcd value="B" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
